author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Rearrange the header file in SimG4CMS/HGCalTestBeam and make first example for dd4hep (replacing #34752)

#### PR validation:

Use the cfg's in SimG4CMS/HGCalTestBeam/test

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-TB63Z Rearrange the header file and make first example for dd4hep (replacing #34752)
